question: 慎重
sourceMnemonic: <kanji>Humility</kanji> is <kanji>heavy</kanji>, so it's best nobody knows your secret. You should be <vocabulary>discreet</vocabulary> instead.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You just need to remember the alternative reading for <ja>重</ja>. If you aren't discreet or careful, the evil Mrs. <reading>Chou</reading> (<ja>ちょう</ja>)will find you and kill you!
